Confound.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Hitting an enemy with Poison Bolts reduces the cooldown of Smoke screen by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Debilitate.card_desc: [Debilitate] Poison Bolts now deals 25% more damage, twice as fast.

Decrepify.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Hitting Poison Bolts cause you to not consume ammo for {scale=0.6|0.6}s

Dissipate.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed for 2s when entering Smoke Screen.

Emergency Exit.card_desc: [Hidden] You automatically enter Stealth when you drop below 30% Health. This effect can happen once every {scale=25|-5}s.

Healing Vapors.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Grants {scale=100|100} Health over 2s when entering Smoke Screen.

Nimble Fingers.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Activating Poison Bolts increases reload speed by {scale=10|10}% for 5s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Hidden] Gain {scale=5|5}% additional Movement Speed during Hidden.

Poisoner.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Reduce the cooldown of Poison Bolts by {scale=1|1}s.

Preparation.card_desc: [Armor] Killing an enemy resets all your Cooldowns and heals you for 500 Health.

Quick Smoker.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Reduce the cooldown of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Shadow Affinity.card_desc: [Hidden] Reduce the cooldown of Hidden by {scale=1|1}s.

Slip Away.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=3|3}% movement speed when Out of Combat.

Smoke and Dagger.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen now Heals allies inside it for 400 Health every 1s.

Specter.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Increase the duration of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Victory Rush.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 8s after getting an elimination.
